root.name: dist()

example.code: # Sets the background gray value based on the distance # of the mouse from the center of the screen def draw(): noStroke() d = dist(width/2, height/2, mouseX, mouseY) maxDist = dist(0, 0, width/2, height/2) gray = map(d, 0, maxDist, 0, 255) fill(gray) rect(0, 0, width, height)

root.description: Calculates the distance between two points.
root.syntax: dist(x1, y1, x2, y2) dist(x1, y1, z1, x2, y2, z2)

parameter.label: x1
parameter.description: float: x-coordinate of the first point

parameter.label: y1
parameter.description: float: y-coordinate of the first point

parameter.label: z1
parameter.description: float: z-coordinate of the first point

parameter.label: x2
parameter.description: float: x-coordinate of the second point

parameter.label: y2
parameter.description: float: y-coordinate of the second point

parameter.label: z2
parameter.description: float: z-coordinate of the second point
